title: Conference will focus on quake preparedness
author: Unknown
text: Conference will focus    on quake preparedness    SEATTLE         When you feel the earth shake, it's probably too late. The Greater Seattle Chamber of Commerce and the American Red Cross are encouraging businesses to make preparations for such a disaster         The  chamber's Leadership Tomorrow group and the Red Cross are hosting a conference May 15 on earthquake disasters.         ``We are in one of the 12 regions of the country at high risk for a major earthquake,'' the  chamber says. ``There is a need to prepare . . . for what to do before the `big one' hits and after the destruction is done.''        The conference will be  at the Seattle Sheraton Hotel and Towers.        For more information, contact Terri Giles at 323-2345.
